metadata.title: CVE-2024-53145 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:um: Fix potential integer overflow during physmem setupThis issue happens when the real map size is greater than LONG_MAX,which can be easily triggered on UML/i386.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
